verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from Yahweh, <WH3068> after <WH310> that Nebuzaradan <WH5018> the captain <WH7227> of the guard <WH2876> had let him go <WH7971> from Ramah, <WH7414> when he had taken <WH3947> him being bound <WH631> in chains <WH246> among <WH8432> all the captives <WH1546> of Jerusalem <WH3389> and Judah, <WH3063> who were carried away captive <WH1540> to Babylon. <WH894>

and Yahweh <WH3068> has brought <WH935> it, <WH6213> and done according as he spoke: <WH1696> because you have sinned <WH2398> against Yahweh, <WH3068> and have not obeyed <WH8085> his voice, <WH6963> therefore this thing has come on you. <WH1697>

Then went <WH935> Jeremiah <WH3414> to Gedaliah <WH1436> the son <WH1121> of Ahikam <WH296> to Mizpah, <WH4708> and lived <WH3427> with him among <WH8432> the people <WH5971> who were left <WH7604> in the land. <WH776>

then they came <WH935> to Gedaliah <WH1436> to Mizpah, <WH4708> Ishmael <WH3458> the son <WH1121> of Nethaniah, <WH5418> and Johanan <WH3110> and Jonathan <WH3129> the sons <WH1121> of Kareah, <WH7143> and Seraiah <WH8304> the son <WH1121> of Tanhumeth, <WH8576> and the sons <WH1121> of Ephai <WH5778> the Netophathite, <WH5200> and Jezaniah <WH3153> the son <WH1121> of the Maacathite, <WH4602> they and their men. <WH582>

Gedaliah <WH1436> the son <WH1121> of Ahikam <WH296> the son <WH1121> of Shaphan <WH8227> swore <WH7650> to them and to their men, <WH582> saying, <WH559> Don't <WH3372> be afraid to serve <WH5647> the Chaldeans: <WH3778> dwell in <WH3427> the land, <WH776> and serve <WH5647> the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and it shall be well with you. <WH3190>

As for me, <WH3427> behold, I will dwell at Mizpah, <WH4709> to stand <WH5975> before the Chaldeans <WH3778> who shall come <WH935> to us: <WH622> but you, gather wine <WH3196> and summer fruits <WH7019> and oil, <WH8081> and put <WH7760> them in your vessels, <WH3627> and dwell <WH3427> in your cities <WH5892> that you have taken. <WH8610>

Likewise when all the Jews <WH3064> who were in Moab, <WH4124> and among the children of Ammon, <WH5983> and in Edom, <WH123> and who were in all the countries, <WH776> heard <WH8085> that the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> had left <WH5414> a remnant <WH7611> of Judah, <WH3063> and that he had set <WH6485> over them Gedaliah <WH1436> the son <WH1121> of Ahikam, <WH296> the son <WH1121> of Shaphan; <WH8227>

then all the Jews <WH3064> returned out <WH7725> of all places <WH4725> where they were driven, <WH5080> and came <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Judah, <WH3063> to Gedaliah, <WH1436> to Mizpah, <WH4708> and gathered <WH622> wine <WH3196> and summer fruits <WH7019> very <WH3966> much. <WH7235>

and said <WH559> to him, <WH3045> Do you know <WH3045> that Baalis <WH1185> the king <WH4428> of the children of Ammon <WH1121> has sent <WH7971> Ishmael <WH3458> the son <WH1121> of Nethaniah <WH5418> to take <WH5221> your life? <WH1436> But Gedaliah the son <WH1121> of Ahikam <WH296> didn't <WH539> believe them.

Then Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Kareah <WH7143> spoke <WH559> to Gedaliah <WH1436> in Mizpah <WH4709> secretly, <WH5643> saying, <WH559> Please let me go, <WH3212> and I will kill <WH5221> Ishmael <WH3458> the son <WH1121> of Nethaniah, <WH5418> and no man <WH376> shall know <WH3045> it: <WH5221> why should he take your life, <WH3064> that all the Jews who are gathered <WH6908> to you should be scattered, <WH6327> and the remnant <WH7611> of Judah <WH3063> perish? <WH6>

But Gedaliah <WH1436> the son <WH1121> of Ahikam <WH296> said <WH559> to Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Kareah, <WH7143> You shall not do <WH6213> this thing; <WH1697> for you speak <WH1696> falsely <WH8267> of Ishmael. <WH3458>
